Text: WOW, this got uploaded fast today! (usually I sit up all night waiting for these here in Aus, lol) Thx so much again Nepotu - you kick ass!!
Sorry, my friend! I'll try to up the NHL games a little bit earlier for Australia. Cheers!

Much appreciated :) I see all the hard work you put in getting the sports events up here, we're all grateful. I'm on a 16 hour difference, so usually early morning when your uploads start coming in. If you could get my Leafs game up earlier, you'd be a god to me!! lol
